properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORTCOUNT, M.SIGNIN_DATE AS SIGNIN_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS BOARDCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) >= 1 ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC) B

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORTCOUNT , M.SIGNIN_DATE AS SIGNIN_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS BOARDCOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT , (SELECT MAX(DECODE(REPORT_TYPE, 1, '욕설', 2, '도배', 3, '선정', '기타')) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORT_CONTENT , MEM_NO FROM MEMBER M WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) >= 1 ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM REPORTED_MEM

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , LIMIT_REASON , CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'B' THEN '강제탈퇴' WHEN ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'S' THEN '활동중지 ' || NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DATE) - TO_DATE(START_DATE) + 1), '-') || '일' END AS ACTIVITY_STATUS , CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'B' THEN '-' ELSE START_DATE || ' - ' || END_DATE END AS SUSPEND_DATE , DECODE(R.REPORT_TYPE, 1, '욕설', 2, '도배', 3, '선정', '기타') AS REPORT_CONTENT , (NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DATE) - TO_DATE(START_DATE) + 1), '0')) AS ACTIVTIY_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN REPORT R ON (M.MEM_NO = R.REPORTED_MEM_NO) JOIN REPORTED_MEM RM USING (MEM_NO) ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO REPORTED_MEM VALUES(?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, SYSDATE + ?, 'S')

SELECT M.NICKNAME, DECODE(R.REPORT_TYPE, 1, '욕설', 2, '도배', 3, '선정', '기타') AS REPORT_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M JOIN REPORTED_MEM RM ON (M.MEM_NO = RM.MEM_NO) JOIN REPORT R ON (M.MEM_NO = R.REPORTED_MEM_NO) WHERE M.MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_ID, ADMIN_NO, CANCEL_DATE FROM CANCELED_MEM C JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEM_NO)
